TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebHttpBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement

summary.span: 用於設定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) Web 服務端點的繫結元素，這些端點會回應 HTTP 要求，而非 SOAP 訊息。

span.span: A binding element used to configure endpoints for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) Web services that respond to HTTP requests instead of SOAP messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web 程式設計模型可讓開發人員透過使用 "plain old XML" (POX) 樣式傳訊 (而非 SOAP 傳訊) 的 HTTP 要求公開 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web 服務。The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web programming model allows developers to expose [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] Web services through HTTP requests that use "plain old XML" (POX) style messaging instead of SOAP-based messaging. 對於使用 HTTP 要求與服務通訊的用戶端，服務的端點必須以本身已附加 的 加以設定。For clients to communicate with a service using HTTP requests, an endpoint of the service must be configured with the that has the attached to it. Web 模型同時也要求各個作業必須標註 或 ，以將它們繫結至唯一組合的 HTTP 方法，例如 POST (預設值) 或 GET，以及預設為作業名稱的 URI 路徑尾碼。The Web model also requires that the individual operations are annotated with either the or the to bind them to a unique combination of HTTP method, such as POST (the default) or GET, and a URI path suffix, which defaults to the operation name. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中對於新聞訂閱和 ASP.AJAX 整合的支援都是建置於 Web 程式撰寫模型之上。Support in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] for syndication and ASP.AJAX integration are both built on top of the Web programming model. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 模型中，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 程式設計模型](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model.md)。 the model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將此組態項目的名稱設定為 `null`。The name of this configuration element is set to `null` by default by this constructor.

param.name: name
param.span: 這個繫結組態項目所使用的名稱。

span.span: The name that is used for this binding configuration element.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並且指定項目的名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name` 中的預設 `null` 為 。The default `name` is `null` in the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowCookies { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出用戶端是否接受 Cookie 並依未來要求傳播 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

value.span: 如果允許 Cookie，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if cookies are allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供這個屬性是為了方便使用 HTTP 標頭中包含的 Cookie。This property is provided as a convenience for using cookies included in HTTP headers. 用戶端將屬性設定為 `true`以接受 Cookie 後，從伺服器傳回的 Cookie 會自動複製到該服務未來所有的用戶端要求。When cookies are accepted by the client by setting the property to `true`, cookies that are returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests to that service.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property BindingElementType As Type
protected: virtual property Type ^ BindingElementType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個組態項目表示之繫結的 。

span.span: Gets the of binding that this configuration element represents.

value.span: 繫結的型別。

span.span: The binding type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BypassProxyOnLocal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 若要對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果網際網路資源有本機位址，則此資源為本機資源。An Internet resource is local if it has a local address. 本機位址是指所在的同一部電腦、 本機 LAN 或內部網路，而且會識別語法上沒有句號 （.），例如 Uri"http://webserver/"和"http://localhost/"。A local address is one that is on same computer, the local LAN or intranet and is identified, syntactically, by the lack of a period (.) as in the URIs "http://webserver/" and "http://localhost/". 設定 屬性即可決定以 設定的端點在存取本機資源時，是否使用 Proxy 伺服器。Setting the property determines whether endpoints configured with the use the proxy server when accessing local resources. 若 為 `true`，則對於本機網際網路資源的要求不會使用 Proxy 伺服器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 若 為 `false`，則所有的網際網路要求都會經過 Proxy 伺服器。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContentTypeMapper { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定傳入訊息的內容型別對應至格式的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how the content type of an incoming message is mapped to a format.

value.span: 指向對應程式的字串，該對應程式會指出傳入訊息內容型別的格式。

span.span: A string that points to the mapper which indicates the format for the content type of the incoming message.

value.span: 如果允許跨網域指令碼，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if cross domain scripting is permitted; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出在比對 URI 時此主機名稱是否會用來取用服務。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching the URI.

value.span: 值，指出在比對 URI 時此主機名稱是否會用來取用服務。

span.span: The value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示比對時忽略主機名稱。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname in the match.

exception.span: 設定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The value set is not a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void InitializeFrom(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding) cil managed

param.name: binding
param.span: 用來初始化這個組態項目的 。

span.span: The used to initialize this configuration element.

summary.span: 從指定之繫結的屬性值，初始化此繫結組態項目的內容。

span.span: Initializes the contents of this binding configuration element from the property values of a specified binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法包含呼叫基底 ，其可設定在指定的 `binding` 中設定的開啟、關閉、傳送及接收的逾時值。This method includes a call to the base that sets the values of the open, close, send and receive timeouts that are set in the specified `binding`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定配置供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量 (以位元組為單位)，緩衝區管理員管理使用此繫結之端點所需緩衝區。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints that use this binding.

value.span: 使用此繫結設定之端點所使用緩衝區集區的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會嘗試利用緩衝集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。The tries to minimize the cost of using buffers with a buffer pool. 當訊息從通道送出時，服務將需要緩衝區來處理訊息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果緩衝區集區中沒有足夠的記憶體可以處理訊息負載， 就必須從 CLR 堆積配置額外的記憶體，進而增加記憶體回收負荷。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所產生的大量配置表示緩衝區集區太小，而提高 上限來提供較大的配置便可改善效能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定配置供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量 (以位元組為單位)，其中訊息緩衝區會從通道接收訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that is allocated for use by the manager of the message buffers that receive messages from the channel.

value.span: 可供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, available for use by the message buffer manager.
The default value is 524,288 (0x80000) bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用緩衝區集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。The minimizes the cost of using buffers by using a buffer pool. 當訊息從通道送出時，服務將需要緩衝區來處理訊息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果緩衝區集區中沒有足夠的記憶體可以處理訊息負載， 就必須從 CLR 堆積配置額外的記憶體，進而增加記憶體回收負荷。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所產生的大量配置表示緩衝區集區太小，而提高 上限來提供較大的配置便可改善效能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit.

exception.span: 設定的值小於或等於零。

span.span: The value set is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可由繫結處理之訊息的大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be processed by the binding.

value.span: 由此繫結處理之訊息的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務可使用 從網路收到的訊息大小受限於配置給各訊息的記憶體量，The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 這項關於訊息大小的限制是為了避免受到阻絕服務 (DoS) 攻擊。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to denial of service (DoS) attacks.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

exception.span: 訊息超出所配置的大小上限。

span.span: A message exceeded the maximum size allocated.

value.span: 預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若 設定為 `true`，則會忽略 的值。If the is set to `true`, the value of is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReaderQuotas As XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

summary.span: 取得或設定組態項目，這些項目會包含 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets the configuration element that contains the constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定複雜性條件約束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值 (以位元組為單位) 的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

span.span: The value set is .
The quota values of are read only.

exception.span: 設定的配額必須為正值。

span.span: The quotas set must be positive.

value.span: 搭配此繫結使用的 。

span.span: The that is used with this binding.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用非預設類型的安全性，請使用 建構函式。To use a non-default type of security, use the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::TransferMode TransferMode { System::ServiceModel::TransferMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::TransferMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出以繫結設定的服務使用訊息傳輸的資料流處理模式或緩衝處理模式 (或兩者)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.

value.span: 值，指出以繫結設定的服務使用訊息傳輸的資料流處理模式或緩衝處理模式 (或兩者)。

span.span: The value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

exception.span: 設定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The value set is not a valid value.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the auto-configured HTTP proxy of the system should be used, if available.

value.span: 如果應使用系統自動設定的 HTTP Proxy (如果有的話)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the auto-configured HTTP proxy of the system should be used, if available; otherwise, .

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個值是 `true` 且 不是 `null`，則代表有錯誤。It is an error for this to be `true` and to be non-`null`.
